properties.description: The following arguments are supported, at least one is required:

properties.name: name
properties.description: -(Optional) Number of cores per processor

properties.name: ram
properties.description: (Optional) Size of ram in GB

properties.name: vcores
properties.description: (Optional) Number of vcores
It exposes the following attributes

properties.name: coresPerProcessor
properties.description: (Computed) The number of vcores per processor

properties.name: id
properties.description: (Computed) The ID of the instance type

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Computed) The Name of the instance type

properties.name: ram
properties.description: (Computed) The size of the ram in GB

properties.name: vcores
properties.description: (Computed) The number of vcores
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: datacenter
properties.description: (Optional) Location of desired 1and1 datacenter, where the block storage will be created. Can be DE, GB, US or ES

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description for the block storage

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the storage

properties.name: server_id
properties.description: (Optional) ID of the server that the block storage will be attached to

properties.name: size
properties.description: (Required) Size of the block storage (min: 20, max: 500, multipleOf: 10)
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description for the VPN

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the VPN.
Firewall Policy Rules (rules) support the follwing:

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Required) The protocol for the rule. Allowed values are TCP, UDP, TCP/UDP, ICMP and IPSEC.

properties.name: port_from
properties.description: (Optional) Defines the start range of the allowed port

properties.name: port_to
properties.description: (Optional) Defines the end range of the allowed port

properties.name: source_ip
properties.description: (Optional) Only traffic directed to the respective IP address
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the load balancer.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description for the load balancer

properties.name: method
properties.description: (Required) Balancing procedure Can be ROUND_ROBIN or LEAST_CONNECTIONS

properties.name: datacenter
properties.description: (Optional) Location of desired 1and1 datacenter. Can be DE, GB, US or ES

properties.name: persistence
properties.description: (Optional) True/false defines whether persistence should be turned on/off

properties.name: persistence_time
properties.description: (Optional) Persistence duration in seconds

properties.name: health_check_test
properties.description: (Optional) Can be TCP orICMP.

properties.name: health_check_interval
properties.description: (Optional)

properties.name: health_check_path
properties.description: (Optional)

properties.name: health_check_path_parser
properties.description: (Optional)
Loadbalancer rules (rules) support the following

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Required) The protocol for the rule. Allowed values are TCP, UDP, TCP/UDP, ICMP and IPSEC.

properties.name: port_balancer
properties.description: (Required)

properties.name: port_server
properties.description: (Required)

properties.name: source_ip
properties.description: (Required)
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the VPN.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description for the VPN

properties.name: email
properties.description: (Optional) Email address to which notifications monitoring system will send

properties.name: agent
properties.description: (Required) Indicates which monitoring type will be used. True: To use this monitoring type, you must install an agent on the server. False: Monitor a server without installing an agent. Note: If you do not install an agent, you cannot retrieve information such as free hard disk space or ongoing processes.
Monitoring Policy Thresholds (thresholds) support the following:

properties.name: list description
properties.description: `cpu - (Required) CPU thresholds

properties.name:
warning - (Required)Warning alert
    *

      • `alert - (Required) If set true warning will be issued.

Monitoring Policy Ports (ports) support the following:

properties.name: email_notification
properties.description: (Required) If set true email will be sent.

properties.name: port
properties.description: (Required) Port number.

properties.name: protocol
properties.description: (Required) The protocol of the port. Allowed values are TCP, UDP, TCP/UDP, ICMP and IPSEC.

properties.name: alert_if
properties.description: (Required) Condition for the alert to be issued.
Monitoring Policy Ports (processes) support the following:

properties.name: email_notification
properties.description: (Required) If set true email will be sent.

properties.name: process
properties.description: (Required) Process name.

properties.name: alert_if
properties.description: (Required) Condition for the alert to be issued.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: datacenter
properties.description: (Optional) Location of desired 1and1 datacenter. Can be DE, GB, US or ES.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description for the shared storage

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the private network

properties.name: network_address
properties.description: (Optional) Network address for the private network

properties.name: subnet_mask
properties.description: (Optional) Subnet mask for the private network

properties.name: server_ids
properties.description: (Optional) List of servers that are to be associated with the private network
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: ip_type
properties.description: (Required) IP type. Can be IPV4 or IPV6

properties.name: reverse_dns
properties.description: (Optional)

properties.name: datacenter
properties.description: (Optional) Location of desired 1and1 datacenter. Can be DE, GB, US or ES.

properties.name: ip_address
properties.description: (Computed) The IP address.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: cores_per_processor
properties.description: -(Optional) Number of cores per processor

properties.name: datacenter
properties.description: (Optional) Location of desired 1and1 datacenter. Can be DE, GB, US or ES

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description of the server

properties.name: firewall_policy_id
properties.description: (Optional) ID of firewall policy

properties.name: fixed_instance_size
properties.description: (Optional) ID of a fixed instance size

properties.name: hdds
properties.description: (Optional) List of HDDs. One HDD must be main.

properties.name: *disk_size
properties.description: -(Required) The size of HDD

properties.name: *is_main
properties.description: (Optional) Indicates if HDD is to be used as main hard disk of the server

properties.name: image
properties.description: -(Required) The name of a desired image to be provisioned with the server

properties.name: ip
properties.description: (Optional) IP address for the server

properties.name: loadbalancer_id
properties.description: (Optional) ID of the load balancer

properties.name: monitoring_policy_id
properties.description: (Optional) ID of monitoring policy

properties.name: name
properties.description: -(Required) The name of the server.

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Optional) Desired password.

properties.name: ram
properties.description: -(Optional) Size of ram.

properties.name: ssh_key_path
properties.description: (Optional) Path to private ssh key

properties.name: ssh_key_public
properties.description: (Optional) The public key data in OpenSSH authorized_keys format.

properties.name: vcores
properties.description: -(Optional) Number of virtual cores.
Either fixed_instance_size or all of vcores, cores_per_processor, ram and hdds are required.
IPs (ips) expose the following attributes

properties.name: id
properties.description: (Computed) The ID of the attached IP

properties.name: ip
properties.description: (Computed) The IP

properties.name: firewall_policy_id
properties.description: (Computed) The attached firewall policy
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: datacenter
properties.description: (Optional) Location of desired 1and1 datacenter. Can be DE, GB, US or ES

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description of the server

properties.name: firewall_policy_id
properties.description: (Optional) ID of firewall policy

properties.name: baremetal_model_id
properties.description: (Required) ID of a baremetal model

properties.name: image
properties.description: -(Required) The name of a desired image to be provisioned with the server

properties.name: ip
properties.description: (Optional) IP address for the server

properties.name: loadbalancer_id
properties.description: (Optional) ID of the load balancer

properties.name: monitoring_policy_id
properties.description: (Optional) ID of monitoring policy

properties.name: name
properties.description: -(Required) The name of the server.

properties.name: password
properties.description: (Optional) Desired password.

properties.name: ssh_key_path
properties.description: (Optional) Path to private ssh key

properties.name: ssh_key_public
properties.description: (Optional) The public key data in OpenSSH authorized_keys format.
IPs (ips) expose the following attributes

properties.name: id
properties.description: (Computed) The ID of the attached IP

properties.name: ip
properties.description: (Computed) The IP

properties.name: firewall_policy_id
properties.description: (Computed) The attached firewall policy
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the storage

properties.name: datacenter
properties.description: (Optional) Location of desired 1and1 datacenter. Can be DE, GB, US or ES

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description for the shared storage

properties.name: size
properties.description: (Required) Size of the shared storage

properties.name: list description
id
properties.description: (Required) ID of the server

properties.name: rights
properties.description: (Required) Access rights to be assigned to the server. Can be RW or R
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional) Description for the ssh key

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the storage

properties.name: public_key
properties.description: (Optional) Public key to import. If not given, new SSH key pair will be created and the private key is returned in the response
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: datacenter
properties.description: (Optional) Location of desired 1and1 datacenter. Can be DE, GB, US or ES.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required) The name of the VPN

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional)

properties.name: download_path
properties.description: (Optional)

properties.name: file_name
properties.description: (Optional)
